verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H6458>Chisel<s%> you <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like unto the <S%H7223>first<s%>: and I will <S%H3789>write<s%> upon these <S%H3871>tablets<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that were in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%>, which you <S%H7665>broke<s%>.

And be <S%H3559>ready<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and come <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> unto <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, and <S%H5324>present<s%> yourself there to me in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.

And no <S%H376>man<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> with <S%H408>you<s%>, neither let any <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H7200>seen<s%> throughout all the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>; neither let the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> nor <S%H1241>herds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H4136>before<s%> that <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.

And he <S%H6458>chiseled<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like unto the <S%H7223>first<s%>; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3947>him<s%>, and took in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and <S%H3320>stood<s%> with him <S%H7121>there<s%>, and proclaimed the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> passed <S%H5674>by<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>, and <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H7349>merciful<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious<s%>, <S%H750>longsuffering<s%>, and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H2617>goodness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%>,

<S%H5341>Keeping<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> for <S%H505>thousands<s%>, <S%H5375>forgiving<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and <S%H6588>transgression<s%> and <S%H2403>sin<s%>, and that will by no <S%H5352>means<s%> <S%H5352>clear<s%> the <S%H6485>guilty<s%>; visiting the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> upon the <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and upon the <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H8029>sons<s%>, unto the third and to the fourth <S%H7256>generation<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> made <S%H4116>hurry<s%>, and bowed his <S%H6915>head<s%> toward the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, If now I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, let my <S%H136>Lord<s%>, I pray <S%H3212>you<s%>, go <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H7186>us<s%>; for it is a stiffnecked <S%H5971>people<s%>; and <S%H5545>pardon<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and our <S%H2403>sin<s%>, and take us for your <S%H5157>inheritance<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3772>Behold<s%>, I make a <S%H1285>covenant<s%>: before all your <S%H5971>people<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6381>marvels<s%>, such as have not been <S%H1254>done<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>, nor in any <S%H1471>nation<s%>: and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> which you are shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: for it is a terrible <S%H3372>thing<s%> that I will do with <S%H6213>you<s%>.

<S%H8104>Observe<s%> you that which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>: <S%H1644>behold<s%>, I drive out <S%H6440>before<s%> you the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, and the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>.

Take <S%H8104>care<s%> to <S%H3772>yourself<s%>, lest you make a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H935>go<s%>, lest it be for a <S%H4170>snare<s%> in the middle of <S%H7130>you<s%>:
But you shall <S%H5422>destroy<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%>, <S%H7665>break<s%> their <S%H4676>images<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> their <S%H842>groves<s%>:
For you shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> no <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H410>god<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7067>Jealous<s%>, is a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>:

Lest you <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and they go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>, and do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto their <S%H430>gods<s%>, and one <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H398>you<s%>, and you eat of his <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>;

And you <S%H3947>take<s%> of their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H2181>make<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>.
You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> you no cast <S%H4541>metal<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>.

The <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> shall you <S%H8104>keep<s%>. <S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>, as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4150>you<s%>, in the time of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib<s%>: for in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib<s%> you came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
All that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%> is <S%H6363>mine<s%>; and every firstborn among your <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, whether <S%H7794>ox<s%> or <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, that is <S%H2142>male<s%>.

But the <S%H6363>firstborn<s%> of an <S%H2543>donkey<s%> you shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> with a <S%H7716>lamb<s%>: and if you <S%H6299>redeem<s%> him <S%H6202>not<s%>, then shall you break his neck. All the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> you shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%>. And none shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H7387>empty<s%>.

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H5647>work<s%>, but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7673>rest<s%>: in plowing <S%H2758>time<s%> and in <S%H7105>harvest<s%> you shall <S%H7673>rest<s%>.

And you shall <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks<s%>, of the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H614>harvest<s%> at the <S%H8141>year<s%>'s <S%H8622>end<s%>.

Three <S%H6471>times<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> shall all your men <S%H2138>children<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H113>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For I will cast <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7337>you<s%>, and enlarge your <S%H1366>borders<s%>: neither shall any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2530>desire<s%> your <S%H776>land<s%>, when you shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6471>thrice<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%>.

You shall not <S%H7819>offer<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H2557>yeast<s%>; neither shall the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H6453>passover<s%> be <S%H3885>left<s%> unto the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

The <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> of your <S%H127>land<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>. You shall not <S%H1310>boil<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H2461>milk<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3789>Write<s%> you these <S%H1697>words<s%>: for after the <S%H6310>tone<s%> of these <S%H1697>words<s%> I have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you and with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he was there with the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>; he did neither <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>. And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> upon the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1697>commandments<s%>.

And it came to <S%H4872>pass<s%>, when Moses came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> with the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H3027>hand<s%>, when he came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone<s%> while he talked with <S%H1696>him<s%>.

And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H5785>behold<s%>, the skin of his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone<s%>; and they were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to come near <S%H5066>him<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H175>them<s%>; and Aaron and all the <S%H5387>rulers<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H4872>him<s%>: and Moses talked with <S%H1696>them<s%>.

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%>: and he gave them in <S%H6680>commandment<s%> all that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> with him in <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>.
And when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with <S%H5414>them<s%>, he put a <S%H4533>veil<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%>.

But when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H5493>him<s%>, he took the <S%H4533>veil<s%> <S%H5493>off<s%>, until he came <S%H3318>out<s%>. And he came <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that which he was <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, that the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>put<s%> the <S%H4533>veil<s%> upon his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>, until he <S%H935>went<s%> in to speak with <S%H1696>him<s%>.
